query.statement:
SELECT 'U' FLAG ,CAST(#YYMM# AS VARCHAR(6)) YYMM ,SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(A.MANDT,'CS115',A.CS126_ARA) ARA --지역 ,SAPHEE.GET_VENDER_N_NAME(A.MANDT,A.CS126_BSU) BSU --협력사 ,A.CS126_UPN UPN ,A.CS126_PJT PJT ,A.CS126_HNO HNO ,A.CS121_SPT SPT ,CASE Z.ZSPEC7 WHEN '' THEN 0 ELSE INT(Z.ZSPEC7) END FNT --층수 ,A.CS126_MLT MLT ,VALUE(K.CS200_MLT, 0) MLT2 ,A.CS126_GNO GNO ,K.CS200_MAN MAN
FROM ( SELECT A.MANDT ,A.CS126_ARA ,A.CS126_BSU ,A.CS126_UPN ,A.CS126_PJT ,A.CS126_HNO ,A.CS126_MLT ,A.CS121_SPT ,A.CS126_GNO
FROM ( SELECT A.MANDT, A.CS126_ARA, A.CS126_BSU, A.CS126_UPN, A.CS126_CST, A.CS126_PJT, A.CS126_HNO, A.CS126_MLT, A.CS126_GNO, B.CS121_SPT FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST121 B --유상온핸드 현장 ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS126_UPN = B.CS121_UPN AND A.CS126_CST = B.CS121_CST WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND #YYMM# || '15' BETWEEN A.CS126_USD AND A.CS126_UMR AND A.CS126_DDT = '' AND A.CS126_PST = 'A6' AND A.CS126_GND = 'D' AND A.CS126_TGB = '1' --직영 AND SUBSTR(A.CS126_HNO,1,1) IN ('L','S','W') ) A, ( SELECT MANDT, CS127_UPN, CS127_CST, CS127_GNO FROM SAPHEE.ZCST127 --유상계약별 상주현장 리스트 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS127_DDT = '' AND CS127_PST = 'A6' GROUP BY MANDT, CS127_UPN, CS127_CST, CS127_GNO )B WHERE A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.CS126_GNO = B.CS127_GNO
) A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 Z ON A.MANDT = Z.MANDT AND A.CS126_PJT = Z.POSID AND A.CS126_PJT || A.CS126_HNO = Z.POSID_1 LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST200 K ON A.MANDT = K.MANDT AND A.CS126_GNO = K.CS200_GNO AND A.CS126_PJT = K.CS200_PJT AND A.CS126_HNO = K.CS200_HNO AND K.CS200_YMD = #YYMM# WHERE 1=1
AND A.CS126_ARA = #ARA#
AND A.CS126_UPN = #UPN#
ORDER BY 3,4,6,5,7 WITH UR
